name: Goatball
description:
I recommend playing with browser in full-screen mode (otherwise the game may loose focus sometimes)

As we all know, goats are exceptionally good at climbing mountains and they can roll into balls to bounce into otherwise unreachable areas. Help this lost goat find its herd. But be careful - goatballs cannot be controlled in any way!

Created in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2020. The theme: "out of control".
